name: University of Nevada, Reno (UNR)
description: UNR has an Office of International Students and Scholars (OISS) that provides advising on visa categories, admissions, employment options, and cultural adjustment. They also have a Chinese Studies Program
services: Chinese-speaking Transfer advising in Nevada consultation

name: University of Nevada, Las Vegas (UNLV)
address: 4505 S Maryland Pkwy, Las Vegas, NV 89154
description: UNLV offers services through its Office of International Student and Scholar Compliance (ISSC) for immigration support and advising. They also have a Chinese Studies Program and a Sands Institute for Chinese Language and Culture. The Chinese Students and Scholars Association (CSSA) may also offer peer support
services: Chinese-speaking Transfer advising in Nevada consultation

name: College of Southern Nevada (CSN)
address: 6375 W Charleston Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89146
description: CSN's International Center provides services to international students, including admissions, immigration advising, and cultural adjustment support. They also offer a World Languages Associate of Arts degree with an emphasis in Chinese
services: Chinese-speaking Transfer advising in Nevada consultation

name: Truckee Meadows Community College (TMCC)
description: TMCC offers International Student Services that include academic, immigration, and transfer advising, as well as cultural adjustment support
services: Chinese-speaking Transfer advising in Nevada consultation

name: AmazingTalker
address: Online platform, no physical address in Nevada
description: This is an online platform that connects students with Chinese language tutors. While not a direct transfer advising service, some tutors may offer guidance related to studying in China or academic pathways
services: Chinese-speaking Transfer advising in Nevada consultation

name: Varsity Tutors
address: Online platform, no physical address in Nevada
description: Offers online tutoring for Mandarin Chinese. Similar to AmazingTalker, tutors might provide some level of academic guidance
services: Chinese-speaking Transfer advising in Nevada consultation

name: University of Nevada, Reno - Department of World Languages and Literatures
description: This department offers Chinese language courses and may have advisors for students pursuing a Chinese minor or related studies
services: Chinese-speaking Transfer advising in Nevada consultation

name: University of Nevada, Las Vegas - Department of World Languages and Cultures
address: 4505 S Maryland Pkwy, Las Vegas, NV 89154
description: Offers Chinese language and culture programs and has departmental advisors for students in their programs
services: Chinese-speaking Transfer advising in Nevada consultation

name: Mohave Community College
address: Multiple campuses, including one in Bullhead City, AZ, near the Nevada border. The closest Nevada location would be in Mesquite
description: While primarily in Arizona, MCC serves students from the surrounding tri-state area. They offer advising services and have a World Languages program that includes Chinese
services: Chinese-speaking Transfer advising in Nevada consultation

name: ZipRecruiter / Indeed / Other Job Boards
description: These platforms list job openings that require Chinese language proficiency, some of which might involve advising or support roles for Chinese speakers. However, they are not direct advising businesses
services: Chinese-speaking Transfer advising in Nevada consultation
